For verbs roots ending in vowel or ь, add й (singular) or йте (plural) to the end of the root
For verbs roots ending in consonant, if the first person form would have stress on the suffix, add и (singular) or ите (plural) to the end of the root
For verbs roots ending in consonant, if the first person form would have stress in the root, add ь (singular) or ьте (plural) to the end of the root
For verbs roots ending in consonant followed by н, add и (singular) or ите (plural) to the end of the root
